CHTMLWidget Class Reference

This widget enhances the KHTMLWidget to support BibleTime's colour management and to support verse references and the like. More...

#include <chtmlwidget.h>

Detailed Description

This widget enhances the KHTMLWidget to support BibleTime's colour management and to support verse references and the like.

Author(s):
The BibleTime Team

Member Function Documentation

void CHTMLWidget::createEditToolbar ( KToolBar * bar )

This function returns the edit toolbar used for the HTML widget.

The items of the toolbar are already connected to the correct slots.
